title: Present Simple: Negative
description: Слушайте короткие предложения в Present Simple с отрицанием.

tasks.audioText: He looks at the menu. He does not like fish.
tasks.explanation: The sentence says he does not like fish. Other options say the opposite or a different action.

tasks.audioText: She checks her bag at home. She does not have her keys.
tasks.transcript: She does not have her keys.

options.text: She does not have her keys.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says she does not possess keys now. Other options say she has keys or other actions.

tasks.audioText: They wait at the stop. The bus does not come on time.
tasks.transcript: The bus does not come on time.

options.text: The bus does not come on time.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says the bus is not on time. Other options say the opposite or give a different fact.

tasks.audioText: At the shop the seller shows shoes. They do not fit him.
tasks.explanation: The sentence says the shoes do not fit. Other options say they fit or a different action.

tasks.audioText: He calls the office. He does not work on Sundays.
tasks.transcript: He does not work on Sundays.

options.text: He does not work on Sundays.

tasks.explanation: The sentence states he does not have work on Sundays. Other options change the habit or tense.

tasks.audioText: At the bank the clerk checks accounts. The client does not have money.
tasks.transcript: The client does not have money.

options.text: The client does not have money.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says the client lacks money now. Other options state the opposite or a different event.

tasks.audioText: She looks at the schedule. The train does not stop here.
tasks.transcript: The train does not stop here.

options.text: The train does not stop here.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says the train does not stop at this place. Other options say the opposite or different time.

tasks.audioText: At the clinic the patient waits. He does not feel sick today.
tasks.transcript: He does not feel sick today.

options.text: He does not feel sick today.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says he is not sick today. Other options state the opposite or different time.

tasks.audioText: They check the menu at home. We do not have sugar.
tasks.explanation: The sentence says sugar is not available. Other options say it is available or different actions.

tasks.audioText: In class the student asks a question. He does not know the answer.
tasks.transcript: He does not know the answer.

options.text: He does not know the answer.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says he lacks the knowledge now. Other options give the opposite or different events.

tasks.audioText: At the shop she looks at fruit. The apples do not look fresh.
tasks.transcript: The apples do not look fresh.

options.text: The apples do not look fresh.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says the apples appear not fresh now. Other options state the opposite or other actions.

tasks.audioText: He opens the bag at the gym. He does not carry a towel.
tasks.transcript: He does not carry a towel.

options.text: He does not carry a towel.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says he does not have a towel with him. Other options say he has one or different actions.

tasks.audioText: They look for a taxi on the street. The driver does not speak English.
tasks.transcript: The driver does not speak English.

options.text: The driver does not speak English.
He speaks to the driver now.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says the driver lacks English skill. Other options state the opposite or different time.

tasks.audioText: At the hotel she asks about breakfast. The hotel does not offer dinner.
tasks.transcript: The hotel does not offer dinner.

options.text: The hotel does not offer dinner.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says the hotel does not provide dinner. Other options say the opposite or different time.

tasks.audioText: He shows his ID at the police station. He does not have a license.
tasks.transcript: He does not have a license.

options.text: He does not have a license.

tasks.explanation: The sentence says he lacks a license now. Other options say he has one or other events.
